import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FiltroCard from '../componets/FiltroCard' import * as S from './styles' import { RootReducer } from '../../store' const BarraLateral = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { termo } = useSelector((state: RootReducer) => state.filtro) return (
) } export default BarraLateral
